title: Newspaper layout
brief_description: Presents the fundamental principles of newspaper layout to improve readability. Focuses on the following four areas: harmonious layout and eye appealing balance; effective use of white space; accenting hot spots; and eliminating ornamentation. Provides tips such as removing zig-zag meandering type, writing crisp sentences, selecting and cropping photographs and recommendations on font type and size.
